term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - micropore volume in catalysis
term.title: micropore volume

item.text: Conventionally measured by the volume of the adsorbed material which completely fills the micropores expressed in terms of bulk liquid at atmospheric pressure and at the temperature of measurement.
